titles.title: A resolution congratulating the University of Mississippi Rebels women's golf team on winning the 2021 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I women's golf championship.
A resolution congratulating the University of Mississippi Rebels women's golf team on winning the 2021 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I women's golf championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
This resolution congratulates the University of Mississippi women's golf team on winning the 2021 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I women's golf championship.
The resolution also recognizes the University of Mississippi for its excellence as an institution of higher education.
